scripts.test: npm run clean && wdio run wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:browserstack: npm run clean && wdio run wdio.browserstack.conf.js
scripts.test:local: npm run clean && wdio run wdio.local.conf.js
scripts.test:local:debug: npm run clean && DEBUG=true wdio run wdio.local.conf.js
scripts.test:local:browserstack: npm run clean && wdio run wdio.local.browserstack.conf.js
scripts.test:accessibility: npm run clean && wdio run wdio.local.conf.js --spec test/specs/accessibility.e2e.js
scripts.test:github: npm run clean && wdio run wdio.github.conf.js
scripts.test:github:browserstack: npm run clean && wdio run wdio.github.browserstack.conf.js
scripts.git:pre-commit-hook: npm run format:check && npm run lint
scripts.setup:husky: node -e "try { (await import('husky')).default() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }" --input-type module
scripts.report:open: npm run report && allure open allure-report
